metadata.title: Time to Fillet a Dragon Fish

tracks.text: Label, Abyssal Capital R'lyath
Sunraku's muscular body, covered in the scars of Lycagon's mark, walks across an expanse under the night sky and nearly full moon.
Debris floats
Backdropped by lightning, text reads, Shangri-La Frontier
Ink sketch of Sunraku's face. The ink splatters, and Emul falls through it. Sunraku catches her, and she crawls onto his shoulder. Behind him is a picture of Rakuro
Pencilgon smiles at us. Behind her is a picture of Towa Amane.
Katzo's hands burn with fire. Behind her is Kei Uomi.
Psyger strikes the grown with the purple long sword Antinomy.
A nest of interlocking lines forms. Ceecrue, a white rabbit samurai, leaps across them.
Outstretched hands form a diamond. Akitsu Akane's face smiles in the gap.
Rust holds a bow and Mold holds a staff.
Chains wrap around Sunraku's legs
Rakuro reaches up a hand. A hand reaches towards the metal spine in the ruins of past glories.
Psyger-0, Sunraku, Katzo, and Pencilgon stand side by side.
The chains shatter.
In red, fishmen wield swords and race towards the party in a circle.
The fishmen charge Stude at the wheel of the ship.
A mermaid fights a shark-faced merman.
C'tarnid's giant tentacles wrap around the Crying Innsman
A girl with blue eyes and white hair dances. Star Rain, Sylvia Goldberg. She falls into the floor, the floor rotates, and a white super hero replaces her. Galaxia Series, The Meteus
A brown haired girl turns into a tree girl. Nitro Squad.
In front of her stands an old man samurai and a young man with gauntlets.
A whale swims, its face engulfed with fire. It approaches an expanse with floating debris. Sunraku walks.
Lightning crackles across the whale. It opens its mouth. Darkness.
Text, 45, Time to Fillet a Dragon Fish
Sunraku and Araba climb stairs
Roof top
They look out over the city.
4 towers near the castle
They parkour down to the street.
A dragon sized eel breaks through a wall.
Sunraku and Araba break, 180, and run
Arctus Regacles, Level 125
Ahead of them are zombie fishmen
Down an alley
The fishmen pursue. The Regacles swims above.
A beam shoots from the regacles's mouth
Emul sprouts bunny ears
In a puff of smoke, Emul returns to her bunny form.
Regacles charges
A sword strikes the ground. A bamboo thicket grows in an instant, and spears the Regacles' mouth, forcing it into a nearby building.
The regacles flails around, hitting the ground with its tail.
Rust runs up the bamboo, bow in hand. Ceecrue holds on.
She fires double arrows, which kill 2 fishmen.
Araba picks up Emul and Stude
The fishmen climb over the Regacles
The regacles breaks the bamboo
He 180's and equips Ducsuram
He drops a decoy. The Regacles dives for it, but begins to glitch.
It thrashes. Sunraku stares, then smiles.
The decoy end. The Regacles stares. Sunraku readies his twinblades.
Sunraku leaps up a building. The regacles charges the building and destroys it.
He ricochets off debris towards regacles
The regacles dives. He leaps up with Shana-Oh Incarnate.
The regacles fires a beam
He stabs just behind the head.
Akane runs through the city.
Mold rounds a corner.
In a boarded up, crumbling building on the edge of town, Psyger stares at her profile screen.
Dialog, Logging Out. She presses OK
He stabs regacles in the head. Red pixels spray out.
Sunraku holds on to a nearby building. Regacles thrashes, then falls to the ground.
The nearby debris starts to rattle, glow, and rise in the air.
The debris rises up and reconfigures itself within the nearby buildings.
Inside a building
She leaps at him. Damage, -5
Rust cuddles Suzaku as it disappears.
He uses a knife to carve a schedule on the floor.
Text, Day 1 End. 6 Days Until X-Day.
Pixel art title card. Blue text over a starry background spell Shangri-La Frontier
Sunraku holds Ducsuram and stands in Ruluiath.
Pencilgon holds a golden spear and stands in the hidden garden
Katzo holds up fists and stands by the Teardrop lake
Psyger crosses her arms and stands in the Lightless Barrens
Montage of the game store, the Utopia headquarters, the palace, Rabbituza, a tower, and Fifticia.
Sunraku runs across Ruluiath, an underwater city. Fish swim in the air. Seaweed lines the street.
Katzo runs across the cave floor on the shores of the Teardrop lake
A serpent emerges from the lake. Crab pincers snap.
Montage of items. Log. Bow. Twin blue blades. Grimoire. Mana potion. Cards.
Pencilgon runs across the hidden garden. Red spider lilies blow in the breeze, surrounded by cavernous walls, under a full moon.
Ceecrue, Rust, Sunraku, Akane, Mold, and Psyger walk along a dock. A crescent moon shines over the sea.
The Scarlet Whale floats at sea. A giant octopus leg reaches up.
Rakuro, Towa, Kei, and a brown haired woman walk along an urban street. Cars drive by.
Montage. The Sage of Awakening. Akane's fox mask. Psyger in a yellow demon mask. An old man samurai. The beetle helm. A gas mask.
Blue text over a black background spells Shangri-La Frontier
A plane connects to a gangway at an airport.
A black man walks, luggage in hand.
A white girl looks at her phone.
She chews bubblegum and blows a bubble. It pops.
